name: City Run Game 3D
description:
Our new kid Employee has been assign a job to pick up pylons from streets of new contraction city with new colorful Buildings and streets.
YOUR job is to make sure that he doses the job in an adventure fun way , by guiding him in the City Street. Race into the city with fun way

Run, Jump, Dash, and Slide over, around and under different obstacles on his way in this endless running game!
Be aware of the dogs while collecting the pylons, city trucks
Collect as many pylons to exchange with power ups and boosts.
City Run Game 3D best 3D adventure fun game.
The game is fast so you have to race into the city …. Can you keep up with it!!!
Download now Free and try it out


- Tow mode game.
- Colorful buildings
- Game Center
- Coins and power Ups and much more
